rules.description: Home key to the beginning of the sentence (Command + Left). Doesnt work in terminal
Tmux Prefix Mode [Tab as trigger key]
Tmux Prefix Mode [Fn as trigger key]
Tmux Prefix Mode [caps_lock as trigger key] (rev 2)
Tmux Prefix Mode [escape as trigger key]
Swap CMD and Option keys in the terminal (useful for CMD + f/b/d/./_ shell keybindings) #jjo
Map Ctrl_Shift + C/V to copy/paste in term (ala Linux) #jjo
Map Capslock_Shift + C/V to copy/paste in term (ala Linux) #jjo
Home key to the beginning of the sentence (Command + Left). Doesnt work in terminal
End key to the end of the sentence (Command + Right). Doesnt work in terminal
Exchange command + arrow keys with option + arrow keys
Navigate Tabs with CapsLock + Any Arrows
(Atom, CKII, EUIV, iTerm, muCommander, PyCharm, VSCodium) Function keys work as fn keys
